channel.title: How to work with remote workers - what you would like to know
channel.description:
Hello,
I am preparing my speech for MicroConf: "How to work with remote workers". Could you please tell me what topics you would like to have covered if you would listener if the speech? Please ask me questions I can answer during the speech,
-- Roman from IconDesignLAB.com
